content: A new room will be created and all the contents of the selected folder will be copied there. Afterward, you can invite other users to collaborate on the files within a room.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a description of the "Share Folder" action in a shared folder creation dialog. The text informs users about what happens when they share a folder and how it will be used by others collaborating on files within the room. It appears as a modal dialog body component.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog isLoading={!ready} visible={visible} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("Files:ShareFolder")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight={400}>
 {t("Files:ShareFolderDescription")}
 </Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 id="create-room"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "all the contents of the selected folder" is translated as "todo el contenido de la carpeta seleccionada." While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural and fluent translation would be something like "todo el contenido de la carpeta elegida" or "todo lo que hay en la carpeta seleccionada".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'todo el contenido de la carpeta elegida' or 'todo lo que hay en la carpeta seleccionada'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Afterward, you can invite...' is translated as 'Luego, puede invitar...' While accurate, it sounds slightly formal. A more conversational tone could be achieved with a softer wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Después, puedes invitar...' or 'Luego, podrás invitar...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'A new room will be created and all the contents of the selected folder will be copied there' is not perfectly conveyed by 'Uusi huone luodaan ja koko valitun kansion sisältö kopioidaan tähän.'. 'Tähän' (to this) implies copying to a specific, already existing location, while the English implies creating a new location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uusi huone luodaan ja koko valitun kansion sisältö kopioidaan sinne.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Afterward, you can invite other users to collaborate on the files within a room' is not perfectly conveyed by 'Sen jälkeen voit kutsua käyttäjiä huoneeseen tekemään yhteistyötä tiedostoilla.'. While understandable, 'huoneeseen tekemään yhteistyötä tiedostoilla' is a little clunky. It directly translates 'to collaborate on files in a room', but in Finnish, a more natural phrasing would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sen jälkeen voit kutsua käyttäjiä huoneeseen ja tehdä yhteistyötä tiedostoissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "օգտատերերի" (users) appears twice. While technically correct, it's slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be used.
The phrase "սենյակում գտնվող ֆայլերի շուրջ" (around the files in the room) could be more concisely phrased.

The English phrase "collaborate on the files within a room" is not perfectly captured by "sadarboties ar telpas failiem". A more accurate translation would convey the collaborative aspect more clearly, such as 'strādāt kopā pie telpas failiem' or 'kopīgi strādāt pie telpas failiem'.

The phrase "පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්" (pariseelayakayin) is an uncommon and slightly awkward translation for "users". A more natural and common word would be "පරිශ්‍රමණිකයින්" (parishramanikayin) or simply "භාවිතකරුවන්" (bhavitakaruwan).
The phrase 'සහායෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කිරීමට හැකිය' is a bit wordy. A more concise and natural translation would be 'සහායෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කල හැකිය' or simply 'ආරාධනා කල හැකිය'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'සහායෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කිරීමට හැකිය' with 'ආරාධනා කල හැකිය' or 'සහායෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කල හැකිය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folder' is incorrectly transcribed as 'фолдер'. The correct spelling is 'фолдер'.
The phrase 'Нова соба ц́е бити креирана' is grammatically correct, but a more natural-sounding alternative would be 'Нова соба ће бити креирана'.

The English phrase 'collaborate on the files' is translated as 'сарађују на датотекама'. While technically correct, a more precise and natural translation would be 'уређују датотеке' or 'сарађују на садржају'.
